import React, { createContext, useContext, useState, useEffect } from 'react';

const LanguageContext = createContext();

export const useLanguage = () => {
  const context = useContext(LanguageContext);
  if (!context) {
    throw new Error('useLanguage must be used within a LanguageProvider');
  }
  return context;
};

// 翻译数据
const translations = {
  en: {
    // Header
    home: 'HOME',
    aboutUs: 'ABOUT US',
    products: 'PRODUCTS',
    news: 'NEWS',
    contactUs: 'CONTACT US',
    login: 'Login',
    admin: 'Admin',
    dashboard: 'Dashboard',
    logout: 'Logout',
    search: 'Search for products, news, or information...',
    
    // Hero Section
    heroTitle: 'DIRECT FACTORY',
    heroSubtitle: 'SUPPLY',
    heroDescription: 'Leading machinery trading company with 20+ years of expertise, serving 165+ countries worldwide',
    exploreProducts: 'Explore Products >',
    getQuote: 'Get Quote',
    
    // Features
    qualityGuarantee: 'Quality Guarantee',
    aiPoweredMachinery: 'AI-Powered Machinery',
    highTech: 'High Tech',
    
    // Stats
    yearsExperience: 'Years Experience',
    countriesServed: 'Countries Served',
    happyCustomers: 'Happy Customers',
    
    // Footer
    companyDescription: 'Leading machinery trading company with 20+ years of expertise, serving 165+ countries worldwide',
    quickLinks: 'Quick Links',
    contactInfo: 'Contact Info',
    allRightsReserved: 'All rights reserved',
    privacyPolicy: 'Privacy Policy',
    termsOfService: 'Terms of Service',
    
    // About dropdown
    companyProfile: 'Company Profile',
    ourTeam: 'Our Team',
    history: 'History',
    certificates: 'Certificates',
    
    // Products dropdown
    cncMachines: 'CNC Machines',
    industrialEquipment: 'Industrial Equipment',
    manufacturingTools: 'Manufacturing Tools',
    automationSystems: 'Automation Systems',
    qualityControl: 'Quality Control'
  },
  zh: {
    // Header
    home: '首页',
    aboutUs: '关于我们',
    products: '产品',
    news: '新闻',
    contactUs: '联系我们',
    login: '登录',
    admin: '管理',
    dashboard: '控制台',
    logout: '退出',
    search: '搜索产品、新闻或信息...',
    
    // Hero Section
    heroTitle: '直接工厂',
    heroSubtitle: '供应',
    heroDescription: '领先的机械贸易公司，拥有20多年专业经验，服务165多个国家',
    exploreProducts: '探索产品 >',
    getQuote: '获取报价',
    
    // Features
    qualityGuarantee: '质量保证',
    aiPoweredMachinery: 'AI驱动机械',
    highTech: '高科技',
    
    // Stats
    yearsExperience: '年经验',
    countriesServed: '服务国家',

export const LanguageProvider = ({ children }) => {
  const [currentLanguage, setCurrentLanguage] = useState('en');

  useEffect(() => {
    // 从本地存储加载语言设置
    const savedLanguage = localStorage.getItem('language');
    if (savedLanguage && translations[savedLanguage]) {
      setCurrentLanguage(savedLanguage);
    }
  }, []);

  const changeLanguage = (languageCode) => {
    if (translations[languageCode]) {
      setCurrentLanguage(languageCode);
      localStorage.setItem('language', languageCode);
    }
  };

  const t = (key) => {
    return translations[currentLanguage]?.[key] || translations.en[key] || key;
  };

  const value = {
    currentLanguage,
    changeLanguage,
    t,
    translations
  };

  return (
    <LanguageContext.Provider value={value}>
      {children}
    </LanguageContext.Provider>
  );
};
